descgrp.head: Important Information for Users of the Collections

accessrestrict.head: Access and Use:
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for researchers with no restrictions. Registration with the collection is required.

userestrict.head: Copyright:
userestrict.p: This collection is protected by the Copyright Law of the United States (Title 17, U.S. Code). It is the user's responsibility to verify copyright ownership and to obtain all necessary permissions prior to the reproduction, publication, or other use of any portion of these materials.

scopecontent.p: The collection contains 1 ink and watercolor study.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The collection is indexed under the following headings in the catalog of the University of Minnesota Libraries. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons or places should search the catalog using these headings.

scopecontent.p: New York and London: Harper Brothers, 1937
